column1: Dry skin can be caused by: - Cold, dry winter air - Furnaces that heat the air and remove moisture - Hot, dry air in desert environments - Air conditioners that cool the air and remove moisture - Taking long, hot baths or showers frequently - Washing your hands often - Some soaps and detergents - Skin conditions, such as eczema and psoriasis - Certain medicines (both topical and oral) - Aging, during which skin gets thinner and produces less natural oil
